topic.title: Paediatric Critical Care Minimum Data Set
topic.shortdesc: IntroductionThe Paediatric Critical Care Minimum Data Set (PCCMDS) provides a record of what happens to a PATIENT when they receive Paediatric Critical Care in a Paediatric Intensive Care Unit, or other critical care setting suitable for children.
